description: Ni ngombwa gukingiza umwana kabone n’iyo yaba arwaye cyangwa ate ubumuga ubwo ari bwo bwose.
title: Ni ngombwa gukingiza umwana kabone n’iyo yaba arwaye cyangwa ate ubumuga ubwo ari bwo bwose.
content:
Ni ngombwa gukingiza umwana kabone n’iyo yaba arwaye cyangwa ate ubumuga ubwo ari bwo bwose.
Nyuma yo gukingirwa, umwana ashobora kurira, kugira umuriro, gusesa, cyangwa kubyimbirwa buhoro aho yatewe urushinge; ibyo birasanzwe ntacyo bitwaye umwana ahubwo byerekana ko urukingo rukora ariko umwana aba agomba kuga-banyirizwa umuriro. Iyo umwana agize umuriro mwinshi agomba kujyanwa kwa muganga.
